https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/n3h4bhHz1bmMqWVr6jcDKdJ5zCh.jpg A story of love and friendship set against the violence of Apartheid in South Africa. It is a story of the ups and downs of the lives of the three main characters, and how their lives intersect over the years. A Million Colours
